entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is one of the two wizards who are dressed as Muggles. He is holding a large gold watch.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is the other wizard who is dressed as a Muggle. He is wearing a kilt and a poncho.

relationships.description: Bagman and Crouch are colleagues, as they are both wizards who are dressed as Muggles and working together on a task.
